professional_summary: Expert sales broker and business developer with front and back office experience. Led corporate-level projects as Project Manager and coordinated IT developments for federal regulations compliance. Holds a strong technical background as a programmer with expertise in finance and accounting.

key_responsibilities: Consulted with corporate clients on investment opportunities and trading systems.
Created detailed documentation using real-time market data for trading strategies.
Achieved over 40% market share in options traded on the KRX exchange.
Onboarded two corporate clients and developed operational guidelines for algorithmic trading.
Cultivated client relationships to introduce derivatives and treasury bonds.
Coordinated with vendors and departments for compliance with federal regulations.
